title: Game Crashing as of 6.10
body: I can log into my the client just fine, but after champ select i get a message telling me that the game has crashed and gives me the orange button to reconnect. When i attempt to reconnect, I get a message saying "League of Legends (TM) Client has stopped working". I haven't had a problem like this until the 6.10 patch today. I was wondering if anyone knows how to fix this?

replies.body: Are you using recording software such as LoLReplay? We've noticed a trend this patch of players using LoLReplay causing players to crash out after champ select and before loading screen.

Ty so much :D
I have had this problem since patch 6.10 too, and i really just didn't wanna miss U.R.F. xD
You saved my day!

What if you're not using an other software on it at all?
I'm experiencing this same problem but I do not use any other software, if it matter all I use is the screensaver one.

same thing was happening to me as i was trying to fix it it wouldnt let me join 4 games as i was testing if different soloutions worked. Now that this worked i have 4, 10 min delays to join games as well as four losses.. rito please help

> Are you using recording software such as LoLReplay? We've noticed a trend this patch of players using LoLReplay causing players to crash out after champ select and before loading screen.

Yes i was! Uninstalling LOLReplay fixed my problem. Thanks so much!

Firstly, make sure you've checked this post to see if your answer may be there. Otherwise, I'd suggest attempting a repair, by going to the launcher, and clicking the gear. From there, click repair. It can take a bit of time, depending on your internet speed of course. Good luck!{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
